description: KEVIN PAUL began his professional career teaching study skills at the University of Victoria. He has been a student service professional for the past 20 years and has talked with thousands of students about what it takes to be a successful learner. Currently he is president of Kihon Learning Systems, a company dedicated to helping students of all ages achieve success in their studies.
name: Kevin Paul
